scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.lint:setup: npm run lint:setup:server && npm run lint:setup:client
scripts.lint:setup:client: cd client && npm install --save-dev eslint eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run build:optimize
scripts.build:optimize: cd client && npm run build && npx serve -s build -p 3000
scripts.build:analyze: cd client && npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.check:deps: npm outdated && cd server && npm outdated && cd ../client && npm outdated
scripts.update:deps: npm update && cd server && npm update && cd ../client && npm update
scripts.health: npm run health:server && npm run health:client
scripts.health:server: cd server && node -e "console.log('Server dependencies OK')" && npm ls --depth=0
scripts.health:client: cd client && node -e "console.log('Client dependencies OK')" && npm ls --depth=0
scripts.reset: npm run clean && git clean -fd && npm run install-all
scripts.backup: git add . && git commit -m "Backup before major changes - $(date)"
scripts.size: du -sh node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules 2>/dev/null || echo 'Checking project size...'
